name: Celestial
passiveSkills: Block all damage on the first turn of battle
Reduced damage taken by 30% for all allies after the first turn of battle
Remove Immunity and Inflict ATK and MAGIC Down on each enemy for 1 turn at the start of your turn after the first turn of battle

Inflict Doom for 2 turns and Remove Negative Effects, including Silver Effects, from all allies and Heal each ally based on their MR stat at the start of your turn if Seal, Punishment, Force Shield, Titan Shield, or their Golden Versions, are active on any enemy.
